speaker: Lex Echo
title: Music Licensing 101: Is Your Music Ready?
description: In tonight's class, we will conduct a broad discussion regarding available avenues in music licensing as well as the steps and procedures that artists must prepare in order to license their music. What makes a song licensable? Who are the sync agencies and players involved? What music delivery methods are available? We will also cover file types and metadata, ownership splits and contracts, performance rights organization (PRO) registration, and much more!
